description: Hike far, discover what’s out there, and be ready for what the trail brings. Rugged terrain, hot sun, washed out bridges, a quick jump in the lake – this what the superlight Gamma Pant is made for. High-performance TerraTex™ stretch nylon is wind resistant, durable, and dries fast. The trim fit’s articulated patterning frees you to move, the adjustable waist belt rides comfortably under a pack, and five zippered pockets – including one at each thigh – are accessible and secure.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Quick Dry Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
